author: rvc-2011
name: Space Odyssey
description:
dark theme based on space as subject.

wallpaper, gtk3 themes used in sync with the cinnamon shell theme.

suggested GTK3: Oceanic Dark => http://fav.me/d4jrq1d

Wallpaper : The visitors => http://fav.me/d4j6px1

Highlights: The corner ripple effect (starship enterprise), overview image is starship enterprise.

i am sure all space and sartrek lovers might like this theme !

Comments and suggestions are welcome.
